name: Survi.io
description:
Survi.io

Play against other people online! Can you become the player who survives the longest?

You must collect the maximum number of items on the ground without touching the drag of the other players! You can touch your drag but if a player touches it, he dies!

Collect points as you play to change your appearance in the shop!

Download now and start surviving! Good luck !

Warning

This game is no under development ! This is the problem with multiplayer games : to remain playable, it is necessary to continue to make updates regularly.
